ComicInfo.Summary:
Captive Audience: Meredith puts on the mask and loses herself in the lives of others.
An I, Zombie! Story: Gwen goes trick or treating.
Letter from a Suicide: Constantine battles a Babylonian shape-shifting demon.
High Spirits: Merv gets all the nightmares drunk before they can go out and scare the dreamers.
Do You See What I See?: Fig puts on the creepy mask, which proceeds to show her stories from when other people donned the mask.
